trans-unit.source: Provides a base class for all toolbox items associated with an activity in a workflow designer.
trans-unit.target: Fornece uma classe base para todos os itens da caixa de ferramentas associados a uma atividade em um designer de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] All toolbox items associated with an <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity> class are derived from ActivityToolboxItem.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]Todos os itens da caixa de ferramentas associado com um <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity>são derivadas de ActivityToolboxItem.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity>

trans-unit.source: This class displays a graphical representation of an <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity> class in the toolbox of a design-time environment and creates an instance of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity> class it is associated with when a user drags it onto the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe exibe uma representação gráfica de um <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity>classe na caixa de ferramentas de um ambiente de tempo de design e cria uma instância do <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity>classe está associado quando um usuário arrasta-o para a superfície de design.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity>

trans-unit.source: The activity toolbox item typically represents an activity to create when invoked on a design-mode document.
trans-unit.target: O item de caixa de ferramentas de atividade normalmente representa uma atividade para criar quando invocado em um documento do modo de design.

trans-unit.source: This class inherits directly from the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem> class.
trans-unit.target: Esta classe herda diretamente da <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem>classe</xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem> de

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityToolboxItem"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityToolboxItem"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The default constructor for the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityToolboxItem> class.
trans-unit.target: O construtor padrão para a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityToolboxItem>classe.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityToolboxItem>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityToolboxItem"></xref> class that creates the specified type of <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> component.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityToolboxItem"> </xref> classe que cria o tipo especificado de <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref> componente.

trans-unit.source: The type of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> that the toolbox item will create.
trans-unit.target: O tipo do <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref> que criará o item de caixa de ferramentas.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityToolboxItem"></xref> class by using the specified <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> and <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityToolboxItem"> </xref> classe usando especificado <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> e <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: When ActivityToolboxItem is called, it deserializes the toolbox item.
trans-unit.target: Quando ActivityToolboxItem é chamado, ele desserializa o item de caixa de ferramentas.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> that holds information to deserialize the toolbox item.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> que contém informações para desserializar o item de caixa de ferramentas.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> that provides the deserialization context for the toolbox item.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>que fornece o contexto de desserialização para o item de caixa de ferramentas.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: Creates an <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> component or an array of <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> components when the toolbox item is invoked.
trans-unit.target: Cria um <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref> componente ou uma matriz de <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref> componentes quando o item de caixa de ferramentas é invocado.

trans-unit.source: The CreateComponentsCore method returns the component or components that the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityToolboxItem> creates.
trans-unit.target: O método CreateComponentsCore retorna o componente ou componentes que o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityToolboxItem>cria.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityToolboxItem>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost"></xref> to host the toolbox item.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost"> </xref> para hospedar o item de caixa de ferramentas.

trans-unit.source: An array of created <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de criada <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"> </xref> objetos.

trans-unit.source: Creates an <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> component or an array of <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> components that generate a dialog box on the design surface when the toolbox item is invoked.
trans-unit.target: Cria um <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref> componente ou uma matriz de <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref> componentes que geram uma caixa de diálogo no design quando o item de caixa de ferramentas é chamado de superfície.

trans-unit.source: Activity designer developers can override this method to display a dialog box when the toolbox item is dragged onto the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Os desenvolvedores de designer de atividade podem substituir este método para exibir uma caixa de diálogo quando o item de caixa de ferramentas é arrastado para a superfície de design.

trans-unit.source: Unless overridden, this method has the same behavior as <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityToolboxItem.CreateComponentsCore%2A>.
trans-unit.target: A menos que substituída, esse método tem o mesmo comportamento <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityToolboxItem.CreateComponentsCore%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityToolboxItem.CreateComponentsCore%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost"></xref> to host the toolbox item.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost"> </xref> para hospedar o item de caixa de ferramentas.

trans-unit.source: An array of created <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de criada <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"> </xref> objetos.

trans-unit.source: Gets the associated display name for the Toolbox item in the Toolbox.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome de exibição associado para o item de caixa de ferramentas na caixa de ferramentas.

trans-unit.source: The type of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> to retrieve the display name for.
trans-unit.target: O tipo do <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref> para recuperar o nome para exibição.

trans-unit.source: String representing the display name for the Toolbox item
trans-unit.target: Cadeia de caracteres que representa o nome de exibição para o item de caixa de ferramentas

trans-unit.source: Gets the associated Image that is used to represent the Toolbox item in the Toolbox.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a imagem associada que é usada para representar o item de caixa de ferramentas na caixa de ferramentas.

trans-unit.source: The type of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> to retrieve the Toolbox image for.
trans-unit.target: O tipo do <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref> para recuperar a imagem da caixa de ferramentas.

trans-unit.source: Image object displayed in the Toolbox for a Toolbox item
trans-unit.target: Objeto de imagem exibido na caixa de ferramentas para um item de caixa de ferramentas
